channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A storm devastated Alaska Native villages. Now their public media lost funding
item.description: A public TV and radio station in Western Alaska serves dozens of villages damaged by Typhoon Halong. But with federal funding eliminated, KYUK faces s...

item.title: Seizures, broken spines and vomiting: Scientific testing that helped facilitate D-Day
item.description: Biomedical engineer Rachel Lance says British scientists submitted themselves to experiments that would be considered unethical today. Her book is Cha...

item.title: Judge says he'll approve opioid settlement with OxyContin maker Purdue and Sackler family
item.description: A federal bankruptcy court judge said he will approve OxyContin-maker Purdue Pharma's latest deal to settle thousands of lawsuits over the toll of opi...

item.title: In Kansas and elsewhere, some state lawmakers are skeptical of the redistricting rush
item.description: Kansas Republican leaders couldn't rally enough support this fall for a special session on redistricting. It's just one example of lawmakers pushing b...

item.title: Scientists pull ancient RNA from a woolly mammoth's body
item.description: Scientists have extracted the oldest RNA molecules out of a woolly mammoth, gaining a snapshot into the processes at work in the extinct mammal's body...

item.title: Emails reveal Epstein’s network of the rich and powerful despite sex offender status
Three killed after bus crashes into Stockholm bus stop
item.description: Three others have have been injured in the crash in the Swedish capital, police say.

item.title: US justice department investigates Epstein's alleged ties to Clinton and banks after Trump request
item.description: Trump said on social media he was seeking investigations into Bill Clinton and Larry Summers, as well as JP Morgan and other major banks.

item.title: New prosecutor takes on the Georgia election case against Trump and others
Russian drone slams into block of flats in deadly wave of strikes across Kyiv
item.description: Six people are killed in Kyiv, and Ukraine targets one of Russia's biggest oil ports on the Black Sea coast.

item.title: US agrees deal to slash Swiss tariffs to 15% after golden charm offensive
item.description: Under the deal, Donald Trump's 39% tariffs will be cut and Switzerland will invest $200bn (£150bn) in the US.

item.title: Comey, James' lawyers argue cases should be dismissed over Halligan appointment
item.description: Lawyers for James Comey and Letitia James argued their indictments should be dismissed because the appointment of the interim U.S. attorney in Virgini...

item.title: White House drops plan to make airlines pay travelers for delayed flights
item.description: The Trump administration is scrapping a proposal that would have made airlines pay passengers up to $775 for flight disruptions.

item.title: "Last Chance U" coach John Beam dies after shooting at Laney College in Oakland, California
item.description: "Last Chance U" coach and Laney College athletic director John Beam died, one day after being shot on the Oakland, California campus, police announced...

item.title: US agrees deal to slash Swiss tariffs to 15% after golden charm offensive
item.description: Under the deal, Donald Trump's 39% tariffs will be cut and Switzerland will invest $200bn (£150bn) in the US.

item.title: She wanted to keep her son in his school district. It was more challenging than it seemed

item.title: Appeals court upholds hate crime convictions of Ahmaud Arbery's killers
item.description: A federal appeals court has upheld the hate crime convictions of the three men who chased and killed Ahmaud Arbery in Georgia more than five years ago...
